name: CybAR
description:
STORY

You play as P̷̶̶̸̴̘͕̘̰̼̐̿̒̀̓Ļ̵̸̸̵̵̭̩̼͚̈́͑̇͐̀Ä̸̸̴̸̸̲͎͉̥͍̈̋̈́͘Y̴̵̸̷̶̛͙̫̞͉͔̌́̏͝Ę̵̶̴̶̶̲̝̲̘̒͛́̕͘R̶̷̴̴̴̛̞͇̗̠̣̉̊̕͠  and you find yourself in an elevator. 
You dont know why you are here or what "here" even is. 
Accompanied by a talking gun you have to make your way through this course and find a way out.

STATUS

This game was originally made as a submission for a university course. We enjoyed developing this so much that we consider making it a small game. However, this is the first game we ever made, so expect a lot of bugs and a prototype of a "story". As of now we can't tell if or when this project will be continued. 

Aside from that, enjoy the prototype and let us know what you think!

Known Bugs & Issues in this Version
  • Time Slow sometimes ends way too fast
  • Enemies search for Player after Playerlife drops to 1
  • Performance issues (Try changing the settings in the ESC Menu under "Advanced Settings" if you encounter huge frame drops)
  • Overlapping UI Elements
  • Crouching is basically godmode
